definition: to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: In our history, staging refers to the era before the mid-nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在我国历史分期上泛指十九世纪中叶以前的时代。

sentences.english: The word Xie (Chinese equivalent to footwear) was formally adopted as the generic name and continued to the present.
sentences.chinese: 泛指鞋履的名称正式写成“鞋”字，一直沿用至今天。

sentences.english: Public-private partnership generally refers to the joint efforts by public and private sectors to handle administrative affairs.
sentences.chinese: 公私协力泛指公部门与私部门共同处理事务之情形。

sentences.english: Now, generally refer to good quality paperboard with smooth finish.
sentences.chinese: 现时则泛指任何滑面，优质的纸板。

sentences.english: Soldiers and horses; generally, an army.
sentences.chinese: 兵士和战马，泛指作战部队。

sentences.english: The Spring Festival of the northern and southern dynasties for the entire spring tuyuhun.
sentences.chinese: 南北朝则把春节泛指为整个春季。

sentences.english: Now generally refer to good quality paperboard with smooth finish.
sentences.chinese: 现时则泛指任何滑面，优质的纸板。

sentences.english: Birthmarks tuyuhun birth exists or born appeared after the congenital skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 胎记泛指出生时存在或出生后出现的先天性皮肤损害。

sentences.english: The world in the Buddhist religion means all the world in the endless and empty space.
sentences.chinese: 佛教中的十方世界泛指无尽虚空中的所有世界。

sentences.english: I'm using the term"Chinese mother" loosely.
sentences.chinese: 我下面说的“中国妈妈”是泛指的。

sentences.english: Western-style food refers to the food or dinner cooked according to the customs of western countries.
sentences.chinese: 西餐泛指根据西方国家饮食习惯烹制出的菜点。

sentences.english: The patterns, and some of the terminology I'll use, are purposely generic.
sentences.chinese: 模式，以及我将使用的一些术语，都表示泛指。

definition: to refer to/to be used in place of
alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
